Year Group:

General health

This part of the survey will ask you questions about your health (e.g. your sleep, what you eat, your physical activity).

Your answers in this section will help doctors, nurses and local charities understand how best to support good general health across Bradford.

Remember, if you do not want to answer a question, you can skip it.
How good is your health in general?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Very good | 2, Good | 3, Fair | 4, Bad | 5, Very Bad

Field Label: Please describe:

Eating Habits

The next questions will ask you about food and whether you are happy with your size or the way you look.  Some people can get quite worried about these things, but may find it difficult to speak about them, whereas others will not worry about them at all. 

It is incredibly valuable to us if you can answer these questions even if this is something that does not give you any concern. It will help us understand what type of support is needed for teenagers, and help local services and organisations to improve things for young people.

Please remember, all of your responses are completely confidential and if you really do not want to answer a question, you can skip it. If anything upsets you, please talk to your teacher or access the information provided at the end of the survey.

 

On how many of the past 7 days...
Have you been deliberately trying to limit the amount of food you eat to influence your weight or shape (whether or not you have succeeded)?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 0 days | 2, 1-2 days | 3, 3-5 days | 4, 6-7 days

Field Label: Have you gone for long periods of time (e.g., 8 or more waking hours) without eating anything at all in order to influence your weight or shape?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 0 days | 2, 1-2 days | 3, 3-5 days | 4, 6-7 days

Field Label: Has thinking about food, eating or calories made it very difficult to concentrate on things you are interested in (such as working, following a conversation or reading)?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 0 days | 2, 1-2 days | 3, 3-5 days | 4, 6-7 days

Field Label: Has thinking about your weight or shape made it very difficult to concentrate on things you are interested in (such as working, following a conversation or reading)?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 0 days | 2, 1-2 days | 3, 3-5 days | 4, 6-7 days

Field Label: Have you had a definite fear that you might gain weight?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 0 days | 2, 1-2 days | 3, 3-5 days | 4, 6-7 days

Field Label: Have you had a strong desire to lose weight?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 0 days | 2, 1-2 days | 3, 3-5 days | 4, 6-7 days

Field Label: Have you tried to control your weight or shape by making yourself sick (vomit) or taking laxatives?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 0 days | 2, 1-2 days | 3, 3-5 days | 4, 6-7 days

Field Label: Have you exercised in a driven or compulsive way to control your weight, shape or body fat, or to burn off calories?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 0 days | 2, 1-2 days | 3, 3-5 days | 4, 6-7 days

Field Label: Have you felt like you had lost control over your eating (at the time that you were eating)?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 0 days | 2, 1-2 days | 3, 3-5 days | 4, 6-7 days

Field Label: On how many of these days ( i.e. days on which you had a sense of having lost control over your eating) did you eat what other people would regard as an unusually large amount of food in one go?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 0 days | 2, 1-2 days | 3, 3-5 days | 4, 6-7 days

Field Label:
Over the past 7 days....

Has your weight or shape influenced how you think about (judge) yourself as a person?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Slightly | 3, Moderately | 4, Markedly

Field Label:
Over the past 7 days....

How dissatisfied have you been with your weight or shape?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Slightly | 3, Moderately | 4, Markedly

Field Label: What prevented you?

Puberty

In this part of the survey you will be asked questions about your experience of going through puberty and some of the changes your body may go through. Remember, all of your responses are completely confidential, and if you do not want to answer a question, you can skip it.

What is your sex?

The biological sex on your birth certificate
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Female | 2, Male | 3, Do not wish to answer | 4, Wish to enter own response

Field Label: Space to self describe

During puberty you may experience a growth spurt. How would you describe your growth spurt?

A growth spurt
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, My growth spurt has not yet begun | 2, My growth spurt has barely started | 3, My growth spurt has definitely started | 4, My growth spurt seems completed

Field Label:
During puberty you may begin to grow body hair. How would you describe the growth of your body hair?

By "Body hair" we mean hair any place other than your head or face, such as under your arms.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, My body hair has not yet begun to grow | 2, My body hair has barely started to grow | 3, My body hair has definitely started to grow | 4, My body hair growth seems completed

Field Label: During puberty you may notice changes to your skin such as spots. How would you describe the changes to your skin?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, My skin has not yet started changing | 2, My skin has barely started changing | 3, My skin has definitely started changing | 4, My skin changes seem completed

Field Label: During puberty you may notice your voice getting deeper. How would you describe your voice?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, My voice has not yet started getting deeper | 2, My voice has barely started getting deeper | 3, My voice has definitely started getting deeper | 4, My voice change seems completed

Field Label:
During puberty you may begin to grow facial hair. How would you describe the growth of your facial hair?

By facial hair we mean hair on your face, such as on your top lip or chin.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, My facial hair has not yet started to grow | 2, My facial hair has barely started to grow | 3, My facial hair has definitely started to grow | 4, My facial hair growth seems completed

Field Label: During puberty you may notice your breasts begin to grow. How would you describe the growth of your breasts?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, My breasts have not yet started to grow | 2, My breasts have barely started to grow | 3, My breasts have definitely started to grow | 4, My breast growth seems completed

Section Header:

Section Header:
Gambling

The next few questions are about gambling activities you might have taken part in. Gambling includes gaming, betting and lotteries. Remember, everything you tell us is confidential; no one at school will see your answers and if you do not want to answer a question, you can skip it.

Section Header:
Knives and Gangs

In this part of the survey, you will be asked questions about gang activities. Remember, your response is confidential and you won't get into trouble for any of your answers. If you do not want to answer a question, you may skip it.
Field Label:
In the last 12 months have you carried a knife or other weapon?

For your own protection, because someone else asked you to or in case you get into a fight
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes | 2, No

Field Label:
Are you a member of a gang?

A street gang is a group of young people who hang around together and: have a specific area or territory; have a name, a colour or something else to identify the group; possibly have rules or a leader; who may commit crimes together.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes | 2, No | 3, I used to be a member but not any more

Field Label:
Police Contact

Final Section: Physical Health II

 

Physical Activity

Field Label: What prevented you?

Sedentary Activity

These questions are about sedentary activity out of school. Sedentary activity means activity sitting or lying down, including things like watching TV, playing video games, and using a mobile phone. 

Please select how long you usually spend doing the following activities:

Field Label:
Sleep

We would like to know about the time you go to sleep and wake up. Please think about the last 7 days when answering these questions.
On school nights, what time do you typically fall asleep at?
On school nights, what time do you typically wake up for the day at?
On non-school nights, what time do you typically fall asleep at?
On non-school nights, what time do you typically wake up for the day at?
Do you ever take naps during the day?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Never | 2, Rarely | 3, Sometimes | 4, Often

Field Label:
